page.title: 10SPORTS ACTIVITIES
page.content: {SPORT There are a number of football fields in the area and many men play in both the Chippenham and District football leagues.One plays on Saturday and the other on Sunday.The river Avon,which runs through Chippenham is ideal for canoeing and there is an active canoe club which is becoming popular especially amongst teenagers.There are also tennis courts,karate and cricket clubs,a bingo hall and a cinema.There has been a revolution in the manufacture of sports clothes.This is now a fashion industry.New materials have made it possible to wash and dry sports clothing easily.Stretch materials have made clothes better fitting.This in turn has influenced fashion generally.Most people are more casually dressed now.
